title: 2hollis Announces Fall 2025 Tour
description: 2hollis will play concerts throughout the US and Canada this fall. Learn how to get tickets here. 2hollis Announces Fall 2025 Tour Jaeden Pinder
author: Jaeden Pinder
excerpt: 2hollis will play concerts throughout the US and Canada this fall. Learn how to get tickets here and see the full list of dates.
text: On the heels of his Coachella debut , 2hollis has announced he’s hitting the road this fall. The singer/rapper/producer will play shows across North America, including two dates in New York City, to promote his fourth album star, which features recent Consequence Song of the Week pick “you.” Get 2hollis Tickets Here The tour officially kicks off on September 19th in San Diego, later hitting major stops across the US and Canada in Las Vegas, Toronto, Boston, Atlanta, Austin, among others. Beforehand though, 2hollis will play a handful of festivals slots, including at Bonnaroo, Lollapalooza, Outside Lands, and Sonicmania. The North American tour ends on October 24th in San Antonio. Tickets for 2hollis’ headlining tour dates go on sale this Friday, April 18th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. A Live Nation pre-sale for select dates will take place on Thursday, February 17th at 12:00 p.m. local time. 2hollis’ fourth record star was released earlier this April via Interscope and earlier this year Consequence included him on our list of emerging artists to watch in 2025. 2hollis self-released his third album boy last June, which was also Consequence staff pick for June 2024. 2hollis 2025 Tour Dates: 05/18 — Goyang-si, KR @ Superpop Festival 06/12 — Manchester, TN @ Bonnaroo Music Festival 07/31 — Chicago, IL @ Lollapalooza 08/08 — San Francisco, CA @ Outside Lands Festival 08/15 — Chiba, JP @ Sonicmania Music Festival 09/19 — San Diego, CA @ SOMA San Diego 09/20 — Las Vegas, NV @ Brooklyn Bowl 09/21 — Phoenix, AZ @ The Van Buren 09/26 — Vancouver, BC @ Vogue Theatre 09/27 — Portland, OR @ Roseland Theater 09/28 — Seattle, WA @ Showbox SoDo 10/01 — Minneapolis, MN @ First Avenue 10/03 — Detroit, MI @ Royal Oak Music Hall 10/04 — Toronto, ON @ Queen Elizabeth Theatre 10/06 — Montreal, QC @ MTELUS 10/07 — Boston, MA @ Roadrunner 10/08 — New York, NY @ Terminal 5 10/09 — New York, NY @ Terminal 5 10/11 — Philadelphia, PA @ Franklin Music Hall 10/12 — Richmond, VA @ The National 10/14 — Silver Spring, MD @ The Fillmore Silver Spring 10/15 — Raleigh, NC @ The Ritz 10/16 — Atlanta, GA @ The Eastern 10/19 — St. Petersburg, FL @ Jannus Live 10/21 — Houston, TX @ 713 Music Hall 10/22 — Dallas, TX @ The Factory in Deep Ellum 10/23 — Austin, TX @ Stubb’s Waller Creek Amphitheater 10/24 — San Antonio, TX @ The Aztec Theatre
html:
On the heels of his Coachella debut , 2hollis has announced he’s hitting the road this fall. The singer/rapper/producer will play shows across North America, including two dates in New York City, to promote his fourth album star, which features recent Consequence Song of the Week pick “you.”

Get 2hollis Tickets Here

The tour officially kicks off on September 19th in San Diego, later hitting major stops across the US and Canada in Las Vegas, Toronto, Boston, Atlanta, Austin, among others. Beforehand though, 2hollis will play a handful of festivals slots, including at Bonnaroo, Lollapalooza, Outside Lands, and Sonicmania. The North American tour ends on October 24th in San Antonio.

Tickets for 2hollis’ headlining tour dates go on sale this Friday, April 18th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. A Live Nation pre-sale for select dates will take place on Thursday, February 17th at 12:00 p.m. local time.

2hollis’ fourth record star was released earlier this April via Interscope and earlier this year Consequence included him on our list of emerging artists to watch in 2025. 2hollis self-released his third album boy last June, which was also Consequence staff pick for June 2024.

2hollis 2025 Tour Dates:
05/18 — Goyang-si, KR @ Superpop Festival
06/12 — Manchester, TN @ Bonnaroo Music Festival
07/31 — Chicago, IL @ Lollapalooza
08/08 — San Francisco, CA @ Outside Lands Festival
08/15 — Chiba, JP @ Sonicmania Music Festival
09/19 — San Diego, CA @ SOMA San Diego

10/16 — Atlanta, GA @ The Eastern
10/19 — St. Petersburg, FL @ Jannus Live
10/21 — Houston, TX @ 713 Music Hall
10/22 — Dallas, TX @ The Factory in Deep Ellum
10/23 — Austin, TX @ Stubb’s Waller Creek Amphitheater
10/24 — San Antonio, TX @ The Aztec Theatre
